_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:34:13 using v2.0
title: Would patients recommend their GP surgery to someone who has just moved to the local area?
analysis_commentary: A similarly high percentage would recommend their GP surgery to someone who has just moved to the local area; this was 82% in 2011/2012 and 80% in 2012/2013 with the pattern continuing into later 2013.
